function.name: explore_wall_following
function.description: Explore with the wall following strategy. The wall following strategy is a heuristic strategy based on the geometric characteristics of the environment. The core idea is to gradually explore the path by always moving along the right wall.

function.name: navigate_to
function.description: Move to a specific location following navigation system's guidelines. The location must be a known spot previously marked in the map.

target.description: The target location to navigate to. This must be a valid known location in the navigation system.

function.name: navigate_to_safety
function.description: Navigate to the nearest known safe location in emergency situations. The system will identify the closest landmark that has been marked as safe and plan a path to reach it.

priority.description: The priority level of the safety navigation. High priority will take the most direct path, disregarding exploration opportunities.

function.name: explore_area
function.description: Actively explore a specified area to map it, identify landmarks, and discover resources. Uses uncertainty-aware exploration to focus on unknown regions.

radius.description: The radius (in meters) around the current position to explore. Default is 50m.

strategy.description: The exploration strategy to use. Frontier focuses on edges, uncertainty focuses on unmapped areas, combined uses both.

function.name: mark_location
function.description: Mark the current location with a custom label and description. This creates a landmark in the semantic map that can be referenced later.

name.description: The name to give to this location (must be unique)

description.description: A brief description of this location and its significance

type.description: The type of location being marked

function.name: scan_environment
function.description: Perform a detailed scan of the current environment, identifying entities, hazards, and resources. This enhances perception and updates the risk assessment system.

focus.description: What to focus on during the scan. Default is 'all'.

function.name: create_path
function.description: Plan and record a path between two known landmarks. This creates a reusable navigation route that can be followed later.

start.description: The starting landmark name. Use 'current' for current position.

path_name.description: A name for this path to reference it later

function.name: follow_path
function.description: Follow a previously created path between landmarks. More efficient than calculating a new path each time.

path_name.description: The name of the path to follow
